name: My Home In Space
description:
My Home In Space was originally intended to be trading simulator between planets. But the scope was too high. So I have thought about how am I going to interpret the theme and I have decided to make a game where beings on planed trash their planet until they go extinct. Though, it's a jam - spare me. 

Lesson: I should have spent less time on UI views - there were only 2. And I have spent a lot of time automating animations creation.

Thanks Hotaru Petrov! For awesome ambient music and sound effects! And for helping with idea for the game ^_^

Originally created for GGJ 2019
